pageContext.claim: “Excuse me. I'm okay with masks. I like it. I think it's good. A lot of people like it.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump claims he does not mind masks but he has has been very inconsistent in promoting mask usage, both in the White House and at his rallies. He also sometimes makes remarks that suggests he does not believe masks are especially useful in preventing the spread of the disease. He also initially mocked Joe Biden for wearing a mask.
